summary:
Senior Marketing / Market Research manager who is looking for a new challenge, available immediately and regarding terms of employment flexible.
In the beginning of this year, after 28 years of service, I left by mutual consent the international FMCG company(Imperial Tobacco, previously Douwe Egberts Van Nelle Tabaksmaatschappij). 

I have always been the binding element between Marketing, Market Research and Finance. Finding together the right solution for marketing- and market research issues has always been for me the biggest challenge. My approach can be characterized as analytical/modelling but also as a practical approach substantiated by financial data.  Empathy and adaptability were key to work successfully at the international headquarter in Bristol (UK) and to obtain support for projects of the local Sales/Marketing organizations and Manufacturing. Expert in Market Research, Strategic Planning, Performance Reporting, Tobacco and Tobacco excise.
